extendedInfo.description: Learning Vietnamese 1 is book one of comprehensive Learning Vietnamese series. Learning Vietnamese series provides an easy and gradual approach to learn and read Vietnamese at your own pace.Learning Vietnamese 1 offers a wonderful personal touch for any learners in all age groups. It presents the alphabet along with the audios. This book provides fundamental concept of the language. Once you complete this book, you will understand the Vietnamese alphabet and basic sounds.One of the most impressive features in this app is that you can trace your finger over the alphabet to practice the letters while you are listening to the sounds. It is a great hands-on learning tool for all ages.

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: It\'s useful because I\'m still learning the alphabet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sorry
reviews.comment: I thought I was downloading something that would help me to learn Vietnamese - not just the alphabet. Rather pointless I think!
reviews.author: A Google User
